QuestData.Title: Blood Ritual
QuestData.Description: I suppose you want to know what we're doing. Here's the short version - a version at which I happen to be an expert:$b$bThe Shadowsworn cultists wish to summon the demon, Razelikh, back to the Blasted Lands. We cannot allow this to happen. So we're going to summon him ourselves, and then kill him. A task not as simple as it sounds...$b$bLet me know when you are ready to begin the blood ritual, and then stand back.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Speak with Kasim Sharim to begin the blood ritual
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kasim Sharim to begin the blood ritual.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kasim Sharim at the Serpent's Coil in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: The ritual is not yet complete.
QuestData.RewardText: The blood ritual was a success; I can clearly see where we are going next.$b$bI'm sorry, I misspoke. What I meant to say is, I can see where YOU are going next...
